channel.title: Odst
channel.description: I bought it and played it for a while yesterday. Have't finished the campaign but so far its pretty fun. Fire fight is awesome, but theres no matchmaking for it, which kinda sucks. Anyone else get it?

item.title: Odst
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:23, topic:303904”][quote author=Kane. link=topic=400166.msg2987835#msg2987835 date=1255124523]
is shit.

first 10 minutes of playing i lost patience with walking around and having to shoot enemies through red tinge.
firefight is alright, better than the campaign fo’ sure- but the redundancy, sooner than later, gets old.
[/quote]
Completely agree. It was the worse game i’ve bought.[/quote]thats why you mod your 'box

item.description:
@tL wrote:

Frell:

i lost respect for bungie when they sold me an addon for 60$

The decision to make a full priced game more than likely wasn’t made by Bungie, the publisher has full control over that (in this case, Microsoft).

item.title: Odst
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

On the last mission on legendary right now, playing it at a friend’s house.

Overall, the campaign does suck. However, the gameplay is amazing. It should not be compared to Halo, as like other have said this takes a whole new twist.

No, shields. Back to health being the most important thing. Sneaking around enemies like hunters and patrols.

The little helmet thing is pretty useful, with the map and waypoints and such.

It is definitely not a copy of Halo what so ever. However, having said that, the campaign isn’t very good, and firefight, no matter how fun it is, has no matchmaking.

Read full topic

item.title: Odst
item.dc:creator: @Tenac Tenac
item.description:
@Tenac wrote:

I’m a huge Halo fan, and this was a bit of a disappointment. Campaign was short and not rewarding one bit, and FireFight is only fun when there are achievements to be earned. Once I get all the achievements, which are all easy, the game will probably just collect dust, and I’ll be playing Halo 3 for its matchmaking.

Read full topic

I have it, havent opened it yet though. Its mostly based on the stealth and tactic spec ops side of halo. Think of a spartan as a rampage warrior, ODST is like special forces like SAS or Navy Seals etc.
